name: BOnA Pizzeria
description: BOnA Sourdough pizza’s are a unique find – wood-fired, Neapolitan style sourdough bases that are soft, airy and slightly chewy. They’re very light thanks to the extra long maturation of the dough – so indulge guilt-free with gourmet, traditional toppings.
safetyTips: Please enquire directly about safety measures.
